title: If you had to choose a faction to align with what would it be?

replies.body: Piltover, cause it seems like the only not-shitty place

Ionia all the way! {{champion:39}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:37}} 


Yes i know, Sona's not technically aligned with Ionia, but she's from there.

I really wanna say shadow isles but I also don't want to be killed by spirits
so uh..

eh screw it
Shadow isles
If you sided with Them anyway they might not kill you? Nightmares cus of {{champion:56}} lol
Void. They just eat your home then murder you{{champion:145}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:161}}
Join the VOID !!!
I'd actually pick either Piltover or Ionia.
Where are Targon and Shurima?
The one that doesn't kill me and let's me do awesome shit

Not wanting to side with Bilgewater.
Not wanting to be a pirate.

The hell is wrong with all of you?

* Demacia and Noxus are two sides of the same terrible coin, the former of which is a little too close to home for the path much of the world has been on for the last few years.
* Shurima is TOO DAMN HOT
* Freljord is TOO DAMN COLD
* Shadow Isles and Void- you do know that both want to eat your soul, right?
* Bandle is Yordle town. You're too tall. Much too tall.
* Zaun is science-without-ethics in metropolis form. Not a fun place to live if you don't want waking up in a tub full of ice with your kidneys missing as a "best end".
* Ionia is not!Asia, and even as someone with a mild case of yellow fever, who is writing a fic with an MC from Ionia, and has two favorite champions from Ionia (Ahri, Sona)... It's too traditional for my tastes and is likely very inwardly xenophobic like real Asia is. I'm happy appreciating it from afar, since I'm not Asian myself.
* Bilgewater is YARRR!
* Piltover is probably actually a really decent place to live.
Void

Zaun
